content: Hello! Welcome to XYZ Home Services. I see you're interested in plumbing services. Could I start by getting your name, please?
Thanks, Mike! What's the address where you'd like us to provide plumbing service?
Got it, Mike. Just checking if 122 Maple Street is within our service area... Yes, we do cover Springfield! When would be an ideal time for our plumber to come by?
Hmm, I actually just realized I don't have my calendar handy right now to check my availability. Can I get back to you about the time?
No problem, Mike! Just reach out when you're ready to schedule, and we'll be here to assist you. Have a great day!
reason: Customer decided to get back later without scheduling
